text: "Take It Easy" is a 1972 debut single by Eagles. It is the leading single from their debut studio album Eagles and became one of their signature songs. It went to number 8 in Canada. It was covered by Jackson Browne in 1973 for his second studio album For Everyman and Travis Tritt in 1994. ==References== Category:1972 songs Category:Country rock songs Category:Eagles (band) songs Category:Jackson Browne songs Category:Travis Tritt songs
title: Take It Easy
